mapper.sql: create_time , update_time, agent_id, mem_id, team_num, level_user_ids, parent_id,superior, is_del, remark
mapper.select: SELECT c.datelist as dataTime, (SELECT COUNT(1) FROM agent_relation) as agentTotalQuantity, COUNT(ar.agent_id) as agentNewQuantity, SUM(arr.team_amout) as teamAmout, SUM(arr.rebate_amout) as totalRebateAmount, (SELECT SUM(acr.remit_amount)FROM agent_cash_record acr WHERE DATE_FORMAT(acr.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=c.datelist )as totalWithdrawalAmount from calendar c LEFT JOIN agent_relation ar on c.datelist=ar.create_time LEFT JOIN agent_rebate_record arr on DATE_FORMAT(arr.create_time,'%Y-%m-%d')=c.datelist where 1=1 and c.datelist >=#{dto.beginTime} and c.datelist <=#{dto.endTime} GROUP BY c.datelist ORDER BY c.datelist DESC
